name.text: Finding total distance covered in kilometers.

questiontext.text:
<p>Oscar rides a bicycle for \({@monday_deci@\)km on Monday and \({@tuesday_deci@\)km on Tuesday.</p>

<p>How many kilometers does he ride in total for the two days?</p>
<p>Total distance=[[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]]km[[feedback:prt1]]</p>

generalfeedback.text:
<h3>worked solution</h3>

<p>How many kilometers does he ride in total for the two days?</p>

<p>Total distance rode\({@monday_deci@}\)+\({@tuesday_deci@}\) km</p>

<p>Add the distance</p>

<ul>

<li>

<p>Line up the decimals</p>

</li>

<li>

<p>Add the hundreths</p>

</li>


<li>

<p>add the tenths</p>

</li>


<li>

<p>Add the ones</p>

</li>

</ul>


<p>\(

\begin{array}{r}
({@monday_deci@\) \\\\
+\({@tuesday_deci@\) \\
\hline
\({@total-dist@\)\\
\hline
\end{array}
\)</p>

<p>Distance covered is \({@total-dist@\)km.</p>

questionvariables.text: monday:rand(100)+99;/*number of kilometres covered on monday*/ monday_frac:monday/100;/*representation of distance in fraction*/ monday_deci:float(monday_frac);/*100;representation of distance in decimals*/ tuesday:rand(200)+99;/*number of kilometres covered on tuesday*/ tuesday_frac:tuesday/100;/*100;representation of distance in fraction*/ tuesday_deci:float(tuesday_frac);/*100;representation of distance in decimals*/ total_dist:tuesday_deci+monday_deci;/*sum of distance covered for two days in kilometres */
